mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.bishaixiangm_id as bishaixiangmId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.bishaixiangm_liuyan_content as bishaixiangmLiuyanContent ,a.reply_content as replyContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_name as bishaixiangmName ,bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_types as bishaixiangmTypes ,bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_number as bishaixiangmNumber ,bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_time as bishaixiangmTime ,bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_photo as bishaixiangmPhoto ,bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_content as bishaixiangmContent ,bishaixiangm.insert_time as insertTime ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM bishaixiangm_liuyan a left JOIN bishaixiangm bishaixiangm ON a.bishaixiangm_id = bishaixiangm.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.bishaixiangm_id = #{params.bishaixiangmId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.bishaixiangm_liuyan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.bishaixiangmLiuyanContent},'%')
and a.reply_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bishaixiangmName},'%')
and bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_types = #{params.bishaixiangmTypes}
and bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_number >= #{params.bishaixiangmNumberStart}
and bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_number <= #{params.bishaixiangmNumberEnd}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.bishaixiangmTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.bishaixiangmTimeEnd})
and bishaixiangm.bishaixiangm_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.bishaixiangmContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(bishaixiangm.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(bishaixiangm.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
